name: Lost Winter Nights
description:
YOU ARE ABOUT TO DOWNLOAD A DEVELOPER DEMO. IT IS MEANT TO SHOW THE DEVELOPER SKILLS. IT IS NOT EVEN CLOSE TO THE FINAL LOOK OF THE GAME.

~ Discuss about it on Fuwanovel ~

"Another winter passes, with nothing changing.

Ethan Wright is a 20 year old college student who lives a normal, satisfying life.

With his four best friends, he can't think of anything more he needs.

But something is wrong. An unshakable feeling that something is missing.

Until, one night, he meets a strange girl, sitting in the snow.

As weeks pass, Ethan will lnevitably get closer and closer to the truth."

- THE GAME -

Lost Winter Nights is an independent English Visual Novel led by a French screenplay writing student who decided to gather several people to work on his first original story.

Languages :

>> DEMO : English

>> FINAL GAME : English, French, German, Italian

Genres :

>> DEMO : Slice of Life, Romance

>> FINAL GAME : Romance, Psychological, Drama, Thriller

Rating :

>> DEMO : All Ages

>> FINAL GAME : 18+ (Sex, Blood, Strong sujbects).
